this one application called Galaxy ioTInternet of Things is the primary focus of the company and creating eye catching dashboards is the primary task of the UI Team The project was for the Dubai Government The UIUX team consisted of 20 Team members and we followed agile development using jira for development bitbucket for code repo and confluence for documentation IT Web Social Media Manager
